name: Virtual Viewing
description:
By developing some of the industry’s very best 3D, 4D & 5D computer generated images (CGI) Virtual Viewing has built a company that is a dynamic service support and software development business, concentrating on developing engaging visualisations, animations and applications. We utilise these skills to add value to our customer’s sales, management and marketing activities.
Working with a range of clients from SMEs to FTSE 100 including major house builders, architectural firms and construction companies, we aim to assist our clients to secure major development opportunities through the bid and consultation process and to market their properties and development sites. Some of our previous clients include the BBC, ITV, Marks & Spencer, Redbull Racing and AMB (the world’s largest RITS). In construction we can name Mott MacDonald, Mace, Como, Barratt Homes, Carillion and we’re proud to say the list goes on.
